WorkflowInfo.Name: Compare excel files contents
WorkflowInfo.Description: Compare excel files contents and send a differences report
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:MemoryTableComparison;Assembly=MemoryTableComparison, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\OriginalFile.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /> <ns1:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="1" TableName="ServersList" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="ServerName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server1</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server2</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>Server3</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <ServerName>192.168.1.1</ServerName>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%ServersList%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns3:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns4:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%ServersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="ServersList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns0:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS2" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\RemoteFile.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="-2" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /> <ns5:MemoryTableComparison IsValid="True" x:Name="memoryTableComparison1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSetTarget="%readXLS1%" isUseColumnKey="0" DisplayName="Memory Table Comparison" ShowEqual="0" Description="Performs a comparison between two ResultSets." TypeName="MemoryTableComparison" ResultSetSource="%readXLS2%" ColumnKey="" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%memoryTableComparison1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="memoryTableComparison1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns6:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType=">" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& > 0" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns7:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%memoryTableComparison1%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /> <ns8:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Differences: Original File and Remote File on %ServerName%" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16721"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">%convertToHTMLTable1% </BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns6:ReturnValue Value="Default Branch" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="{x:Null}" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="0" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns9:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process compares an original excel file to excel files in a list of servers (all files should have the same structure), and sends a report if there are any differences.
